title: [Self-Directed] Administrator Leadership Program for Enhancing Online Science Education Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of online learning environments and basic educational management principles
context.additional_context: Targeting science education administrators with experience in operating VR/simulation-based education in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the six core elements (institutional support, faculty support, learner support, technological infrastructure, course structure, assessment system) for evaluating online science education quality.
Learners can conduct and analyze online education quality diagnostics within an organization using survey tools.
Learners can establish quality improvement strategies for VR/simulation-based science education that account for cultural differences.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
